entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2025-04-05
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Feature 'Razor TagHelperProvider Feature' is currently unavailable due to an internal error #78017

PullRequests

Created

  • *** FOR TEST PURPOSES ONLY *** #78018
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Handle nameof(indexer) in ref analysis #78015
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Be resilient to (and report) exceptions we encounter when calling into 3rd party extensions in a gladstone context. #78014
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode
  • *** FOR TEST PURPOSES ONLY *** #78013
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • *** FOR TEST PURPOSES ONLY *** #78012
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • *** FOR TEST PURPOSES ONLY *** #78011
    Area-IDE, untriaged

Merged

  • Update maintenance-packages versions #78005
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, Next
  • Add LSP handler for custom requests #77444
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, Needs API Review, VSCode, Next
  • Simplify workspace initialization in the LSP server #78010
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode, Next
  • Add LSP handler to test Gladstone integration #75146
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next

Updated

  • Bind compound assignment operator declarations #77999
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, Needs API Review, Feature-UserDefinedCompoundAssignmentOperators
  • Merge features/dictionary-expressions into release/dev17.14 #77961
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, Needs API Review, VSCode
  • Extensions: ref safety analysis #77967
    Area-Compilers, Feature - Extension Everything, untriaged
